00027     class DummyProducer : public Producer {
00028 
00029         public:
00030 
00031             DummyProducer(const std::string& name, Process& process) :
00032                 Producer(name, process) {
00033             }
00034 
00035             virtual void configure(const ParameterSet& ps) {
00036                 nParticles_ = ps.getInteger("nParticles_");
00037                 aveEnergy_ = ps.getDouble("aveEnergy_");
00038                 direction_ = ps.getVDouble("direction_");
00039             }
00040 
00041             virtual void produce(Event& event) {
00042                 std::cout << "DummyProducer: Analyzing an event!" << std::endl;
00043 
00044                 int np = random_.Poisson(nParticles_);
00045                 for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00046                     SimParticle* a = (SimParticle*) tca_->ConstructedAt(i);
00047                     do {
00048                         a->setEnergy(random_.Gaus(aveEnergy_, 1.0));
00049                     } while (a->getEnergy() < 0);
00050                     a->setPdgID(i + 1);
00051                 }
00052                 event.add("simParticles", tca_);
00053             }
00054 
00055             virtual void onFileOpen() {
00056                 std::cout << "DummyProducer: Opening a file!" << std::endl;
00057             }
00058 
00059             virtual void onFileClose() {
00060                 std::cout << "DummyProducer: Closing a file!" << std::endl;
00061             }
00062 
00063             virtual void onProcessStart() {
00064                 std::cout << "DummyProducer: Starting processing!" << std::endl;
00065                 tca_ = new TClonesArray(EventConstants::SIM_PARTICLE.c_str(), 1000);
00066             }
00067 
00068             virtual void onProcessEnd() {
00069                 std::cout << "DummyProducer: Finishing processing!" << std::endl;
00070             }
00071 
00072         private:
00073             TClonesArray* tca_{nullptr};
00074             int nParticles_{0};
00075             double aveEnergy_{0};
00076             std::vector<double> direction_;
00077             TRandom random_;
00078     };
